title: Advanced Econometrics I
description: Introduces advanced econometric methods. Topics include probability theory, hypothesis testing, linear regression analysis, heteroscedasticity, serial correlation, instrumental variables, and panel data models.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to economics Ph.D. students or by permission of the instructor.

class_notes: Economics Ph.D. students will enroll in this course on the first day of instruction. Please contact the economics graduate programs coordinator for more information.
